original_text: When the people have picked the grain, they can enjoy seven feast days to the Lord. The special days will begin on the 15th day of the seventh month. On the first day and on the eighth day they can rest.
korean_text: 너희가 토지 소산 거두기를 마치거든 일곱째 달 열닷샛날부터 이레 동안 여호와의 절기를 지키되 첫 날에도 안식하고 여덟째 날에도 안식할 것이요

sentences.original_text: When the people have picked the grain
they can enjoy seven feast days to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주를 위해 일곱 절기 축제일을 즐길 수 있다

sentences.original_text: on the 15th day of the seventh month
